title: 46: Sacred Sex For People Who Don't Believe Featuring Tanerélle
itunes:title: Sacred Sex For People Who Don't Believe Featuring Tanerélle
description:
Shan sits down with artist Tanerelle to explore all about sacred sexuality and intimacy. 

Sacred sexuality is an entirely different way to connect with your partner. It involves delicacy, hugs, caresses and even at times no touching while holding space for meditation. 
All this deep work, leads to deep release which can include more powerful orgasms to longer-lasting, non-ejaculatory, and multiple orgasms for men and numerous types of orgasms for women.

Thanks to our sponsor for this episode, Apostrophe!

We have a special deal for our audience: Get your first visit for only five dollars at http://Apostrophe.com/LOVERS when you use our code:LOVERS. That’s a savings of fifteen dollars! This code is only available to our listeners.


 To get started, just go to

http://Apostrophe.com/LOVERSand click Begin Visit,
 then use our code LOVERS at sign up and you’ll get your first visit for only five dollars!
